pages.text: Ye have to fight off the goblins before they kill us all.
They took up residence in the caves to the north. Ye must fight with anything you can.
You're a strange thing.  We haven't seen a new God appear since before the war.  Or are you one of the old ones?  In any case, my name is Serifex, and I bring fresh water to the Bodnam.

links.text: Yes, I'm one of the old Gods... I think.
